channel.title: <Graphical bug> This is what happens when you switch to your Pistol after the Tau gun
channel.description:
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/6187165659035789611/1B7D324F940ED9926686C0C935595E03B0A950DF/[/img]Encountered today in the Multiplayer mode.
Steps to reproduce: * Switch to your pistol after firing with alt-fire on the Tau rifle.

item.title: <Graphical bug> This is what happens when you switch to your Pistol after the Tau gun
item.dc:creator: Captain_Mcderp
item.description:
Looks cool though, like a super-saiyan pistol.

Read full topic
item.source: <Graphical bug> This is what happens when you switch to your Pistol after the Tau gun

item.title: <Graphical bug> This is what happens when you switch to your Pistol after the Tau gun
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
I think this is a known glitch.

And it doesn’t happen only between the pistol and the tau cannon, it happens with all weapons (+ gauss).

Read full topic
item.source: <Graphical bug> This is what happens when you switch to your Pistol after the Tau gun

item.title: <Graphical bug> This is what happens when you switch to your Pistol after the Tau gun
item.dc:creator: SirEgon
item.description:
I’ve also seen this problem with the Gluon Gun. Dying and respawning will sometimes fix it, but the only guaranteed solution I’ve found is to pick up the Tau or Gluon Gun (whichever one is causing the problem).

Read full topic
item.source: <Graphical bug> This is what happens when you switch to your Pistol after the Tau gun
